meanings.definition: The outer surface or structure of something.
meanings.sent1: The exteriors of the house were painted a bright blue color.
meanings.sent2: The exteriors of the car were shiny and well-maintained.
meanings.sent3: The exteriors of the cake were decorated with colorful frosting.
meanings.sent4: The exteriors of the forest whispered secrets of ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: The exteriors of the book were worn from many readings.

meanings.definition: The outside part or surrounding area of a building or object.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed sitting in the garden, admiring the exteriors of the flowers.
meanings.sent2: The exteriors of the playground were filled with laughter and play.
meanings.sent3: The exteriors of the beach were inviting under the warm sun.
meanings.sent4: The exteriors of the city buzzed with activity and life.
meanings.sent5: The exteriors of the mountain were majestic against the clear sky.
